There were 2 other sightings in New Albany on or around February 16th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright,stationary,star-like light over top of school building for aprox.15mins.then very slowly took off,and began to blink.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sky watching, when i saw a bright(but not nearly as bright as Venus is)star-like light appear over top the school building across the street at 8:30pm on Feb.16 2009.It began to slowly raise up, then stayed still for about 15 minutes over the school.It would brighten,then dim during this time.After about 15 minutes it began to very slowly head east across the area,and proceding upwards.It also began to blink.I waslooking out my big family room window,and when i saw it-i felt compelled to talk to it.Very curious as to what shape it really was upclose.
